### Changed
- Use `Standard_D4s_v5` for control plane and worker nodes.
- Use 2 replicas for workers by default.
- Upgrade K8S version to `1.25.16`.
- Upgrade kubectl version to `1.25.15`.
- Disable PSPs by default.
